alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade County through 630 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud over Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, or 9 miles north of The Redland, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Redland, Kendall, Doral, Hialeah Gardens, Pinecrest, Sweetwater, Medley, Westchester, Richmond West, Fountainbleau, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay, Zoo Miami, Goulds, The Hammocks, West Perrine and Olympia Heights. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
